name: Catacombs (itch)
description:
Overview:

Catacombs is Legend of Zelda with triple machine guns. Or maybe Legend of Grimrock with super crate boxes? Does IT even know what it is? No, which is probably why it's so bad. You play a protagonist who was thrown into the catacombs, and has to make their way to freedom. Anyway, looks cool, plays terribly, and made in a week.

Features:

  • Cute protagonist
  • A cool checkpoint tile
  • Screenshake

Controls:

[WASD] - Move

[Mouse] - Aim

[Shift] - Toggle fullscreen

[Esc] - Restart room

A Game a Week [Week 1]:

This game is my first game for "a game a week". Every week, I will force myself to make and release a (terrible) game. It's like a ransom, except games instead of hostages...probably. Stay tuned!
